mapper.select: /* selectUserInfo */ SELECT A.USR_ID as userId , A.USR_NM as name , A.USR_EML as email , A.USR_PSSWRD as password , A.SALT as salt FROM TB_USER A WHERE A.USR_ID = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
/* selectSellerInfo */ SELECT A.SLLR_ID as userId , A.SLLR_NM as name , A.PSSWRD as password , A.SLLR_ID as email , A.SALT as salt FROM TB_SELLER A WHERE A.SLLR_ID = #{sellerId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: /* insertUserInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_USER ( USR_ID, USR_NM, USR_EML, USR_PSSWRD, SALT, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{user.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.email, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{user.salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )

/* insertSellerInfo */ INSERT INTO TB_SELLER ( SLLR_ID, SLLR_NM, PSSWRD, SALT, CRT_DT, UPD_DT ) VALUES ( #{seller.userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seller.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seller.password, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seller.salt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
